meanings.definition: buffiest: superlative form of buff, meaning having a well-developed physique
meanings.sent1: He was the buffiest athlete in the competition, with strong muscles and a fit body.
meanings.sent2: The bodybuilder at the gym was the buffiest person there, showing off his toned arms.
meanings.sent3: At the beach, he was the buffiest guy around, making everyone else feel a bit self-conscious.
meanings.sent4: Among all the students, she stood out as the buffiest, exuding confidence and strength.
meanings.sent5: His dedication to working out made him the buffiest man in the neighborhood, admired by many.

meanings.definition: buffiest: superlative form of buff, meaning polished or cleaned to a shine
meanings.sent1: The buffiest car in the showroom gleamed under the bright lights, attracting many buyers.
meanings.sent2: After hours of polishing, the silverware set looked the buffiest it had ever been.
meanings.sent3: She proudly displayed her buffiest shoes, making sure they sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: The buffiest mirror in the house reflected everything with crystal clarity.
meanings.sent5: His buffiest trophy shone on the shelf, a testament to his hard work and dedication.
